system.description:
Effect: The Terrain type is set to Misty Terrain for the next 3 Rounds.

The user may spend up to 6 additional PP, increasing the Power of this attack by 15 per PP spent.

Requirement: User is Dynamaxed and has a Fairy-Type attack on the Active List.

actions.name: Max Starfall
